mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_IDRECM (IDSGMTSEQNO, IDSGMTLISTSEQNO, ALIAS, OTHIDTYPE, OTHIDNUM, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS ) select IDSGMTSEQNO, IDSGMTLISTSEQNO, ALIAS, OTHIDTYPE, OTHIDNUM, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_IDREC where IDSGMTSEQNO = #{IDSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select IDSGMTSEQNO, IDSGMTLISTSEQNO, ALIAS, OTHIDTYPE, OTHIDNUM, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_IDREC
select IDSGMTSEQNO, IDSGMTLISTSEQNO, ALIAS, OTHIDTYPE, OTHIDNUM from PBCRS_REPORT_IDREC where idsgmtseqno=#{IDSgmtSeqNo} and idsgmtlistseqno=#{IDSgmtListSeqNo}
select IDSGMTSEQNO, IDSGMTLISTSEQNO, ALIAS, OTHIDTYPE, OTHIDNUM from PBCRS_REPORT_IDREC where idsgmtseqno=#{IDSgmtSeqNo}
